attributes.action: END CITY OF LONDON CORPORATION AS AN INDEPENDENT STATE AND REMOVE ALL RIGHTS.
attributes.background: THE CITY OF LONDON CORPORATION IS THE SEAT OF CORRUPTION AND HAS UNDEMOCRATIC INFLUENCE IN THIS COUNTRY.

rejection.details:
The City of London Corporation is not an independent state. We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

It is clear that you are concerned about the governance of the City of London. If you could start a petition calling for a specific action, which would need to be the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, we could look at this again.

You can find out more about the governance of the City of London here:

https://www.cityoflondon.gov.uk/about-the-city/how-we-make-decisions/Pages/corporate-governance.aspx
